short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mass follow and mass unfollow on Bluesky with powerful options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
= MASS FOLLOW =
It works on the followers, following, search and liked-by view. It remembers the mass followed users. So you can later mass unfollow those only.

= MASS UNFOLLOW =
It works on your following view.

= AUTOPILOT =
Performs a series of actions and repeats them after a certain pause.

= WORK IN PROGRESS =
The extension is still new and new features will follow. Please write feedback to hello@clemensteichmann.com.

= CAUTION =
Please carefully read the Bluesky Community Guidelines.

Please find FAQ and Changelog on the website https://www.clemensteichmann.com/superpowers-for-bluesky
